relatedNodes.html: <form class="newsletter_input_group" action="/newsletter_subscribe/subscriber/new/" method="POST"> <input placeholder="Your Email" type="email" name="email" style="max-width: 500px;" required=""> <button type="submit">Subscribe</button> </form>

none.message: List element has direct children that are not allowed inside <li> elements

nodes.html: <ul class="item_menu_items" style="">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  List element has direct children that are not allowed inside <li> elements

violations.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
violations.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

any.message: <meta> tag limits zooming on mobile devices

nodes.html: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, minimum-scale=0, maximum-scale=3, user-scalable=1">
nodes.failureSummary:
